title: Privacy & Policy
content:
Welcome to OceanScript's Privacy & Policy.

By using this app, you agree to the following terms:

1. We collect minimal data to improve your experience, such as language preferences and app usage statistics.
2. Your data is stored securely and will not be shared with third parties without your consent.
3. If you disagree with any part of this policy, please discontinue using the app. We are not responsible for any dissatisfaction or issues arising from your use of the app.

For more details, please contact us at support@oceanscript.com.
